overview:
Since 2002, Afshin has been tethered to Social Media and its development, seeking new ways of implementing Web 2.0 for innovative marketing strategies. His creativity, along with his sociable personality, makes him the ideal Social Media Marketing (SMM) evangelist.

Currently acting as the CEO at Daily Challenge Afshin is focusing on utilizing the enormous power of Social Media to create products and strategies for sustainable social responsibility initiatives.

With an extensive background in web marketing, product development, and management, Afshin has both the vision and the practical experience to lead a startup to its success.
